cleanDesc:
MOMO Steering Wheel Hub Adapter for E34, E36 3 series & Z3
    ...
short-description: This hub adapter allows installation of a MOMO steering wheel (or any steering wheel that uses the same 6 bolt pattern / specs of a MOMO) to an E36 3 series and Z3. Includes everything pictured -- hub, slip ring, and hardware.     This is the most correct hub to use for any E36 Street car. It has the built-in copper contact riing for the horn and a tab for cancelling the turn signals. Because this hub was originally designed for an E36 without an airbag, it will require resistors t keep the SRS warning light off. Resistors are available at any local electronics store for just a few dollars. All that is needed for installation is some basic knowledge of wiring connections. This hub features a crushable base, not a solid piece, making it safer for street cars.      1992-1998    318i 318is 318ti 318ic 323is 323ic 325i 325is 325ic 328i 328is 328ic M3  1997-2002    Z3 1.9 Z3 2.3 Z3 2.5i Z3 2.8 Z3 3.0i M Roadster M Coupe

cleanDesc: Genuine BMW M Performance Steering Wheel - E9x, E82
short-description: The M Performance steering wheel is covered in alcantara suede with M colored stitching It's the same thickness and shape as the factory M3 wheel. The bottom section of the rim has been flattened to allow more thigh room and a better grip when making turns of the wheel past 90 degrees. Flat bottom wheels can be found on the world's highest-performing cars and it's the first time we have seen BMW offer this style as a factory accessory. A reference mark on the top of the rim indicates top dead center of the steering. This mark is common on rally cars and drift cars to let the driver know when the steering wheel is back straight-ahead, without having to look away from the road.   This wheel replaces the sport or M3 steering wheel. It re-uses the stock sport wheel airbag or M3 airbag (not included) and the stock sport wheel cover or M3 wheel cover (not included, see below for options). Photo above shows this wheel assembled with airbag, cover, and multimedia buttons (not included). For Sport Automatic, SMG and DCT cars, the M3 DCT paddles are required - you can add them to your order from the options below.   This Genuine BMW 'Rennsport' Performance Steering Wheel fits the following BMWs:  2007-2011   328i, 328xi, 335i, 335xi **WITH sport package  2007-2012    328i & 335i **WITH sport package  2008-2011    M3 coupe & convertible  2008+    128i & 135i 1M Coupe ** WITH sport package airbag

cleanDesc: Thin Quick Release Gold
E90/E92 M3 Steering Wheel - Fits all E90/E92 3 Series
short-description: Upgrade your non-M E90/E92 3 series "sport" steering wheel to the the M3 steering wheel, which features sportier styling, thicker diameter hand gripping surface, and tri-color M stiching around the inside. The M3 wheel feels much more substantial and "meatier", thanks to the added thickness and well contoured thumb grips. This is the Genuine BMW steering wheel that comes on 2008 M3 (6 speed manual transmission). Airbag not included. The airbag must be re-used from your stock "sport" steering wheel, so you'll want to check your existing airbag to make sure you have the round "sport" airbag. If you do not have the sport airbag already, you would have to purchase a new one in order to use this steering wheel. This wheel will work with your existing sport steering wheel cover and your multi-function buttons or you can choose to add the M3 cover below (shown in the photos above,    included with wheel).   This E90/E92 M3 steering wheel will fit all 2006 325i, 325xi, 330i, 330xi (with sport package steering wheel) and all 2007 and newer 328i, 328xi, 335i & 335xi coupe and sedan (with sport package steering wheel).

cleanDesc: Rennline Steering Wheel Quick Disconnect - Red
short-description: Looking for the highest quality steering wheel quick release on the market? Well this is it. This hub has a tapered asymmetrical socket that eliminates chances of looseness as the hub breaks in, a feature not normally found on competitor's quick disconnects. Also, Rennline Quick Releases are equipped with spring loaded roll pins that allow for seamless one hand removal, which is essential for emergency situations.

cleanDesc: OMP Trecento Racing Steering Wheel - 300mm | Black Suede
short-description: Classic 3-spoke OMP Trecento steering wheel in 300mm diameter. Anodized aluminum center with OMP horn button and black suede rim. The steering wheel rim is oval shaped so your fingers wrap around the rim for improved grip. The spokes have contours for resting your thumbs to give you more leverage and grip. The bottom half of the rim is extra thick for more cushion and grip. A bright yellow top-center band gives you a strong reference point for when the wheel is angled or back to center. The 300mm size is on the small size compared to most BMW wheels (stock is usually around 380mm) and may block gauges or instruments, depending on steering column adjustment. A steering column hub adapter is required.

cleanDesc:
E46 M3 Steering Wheel (Fits All E46 w/ Round Sport Airbag)
        ...
short-description: Your BMW's steering wheel is what you touch and interact with most on your BMW. This wheel is perfect for either refreshing a worn stock E46 M3 steering wheel, OR to upgrade the wheel on a sport-package equipped 325i, 325Ci, 330i or 330Ci (with the circular/round shaped sport airbag).    This Genuine BMW E46 M3 steering wheel has a much thicker circumference, which on a non-M3 totally changes the "feel" of your steering. This wheel has the same girthy rim thickness like that of the 330i/330Ci ZHP package, making it highly desirable in a non-M3. We've installed this wheel on several customer non-M E46s, and the feedback has been resounding -- this is one of the best mods you can do to make a 325 or 330's steering feel better from the driver's seat.    This wheel comes as shown, and does not include the airbag. Wheel comes complete with comfortable thumbs grips, "///M" logo lower fascia, multi-function button panel, and tri-color M stitching on the inner seam. Installation can be done in less than 10 minutes! DOES NOT INCLUDE AIRBAG -- You must reuse your existing airbag. If you are putting this wheel on a non-M3, please make SURE your 3 series came with the "sport package" round style airbag. Any other airbag will not fit this wheel.      2001-2005    325i, 325xi, 330i, 330xi **WITH sport package wheel  2001-2006    325Ci & 330Ci **WITH sport package wheel  2001-2006    coupe/convertible (6 speed Manual only, no SMG)

cleanDesc: Sabelt GT Flat Steering Wheel - 330mm
short-description: Sabelt makes some of the finest racing steering wheels for any application. Premium materials and fine craftsmanship combine to offer a wheel that is extremely well built and timelessly beautiful. 6 mounting holes and the ability to be used with a quick release makes these wheels extremely modular in regards to mounting style and gauge/shift light configuration. Choose a welded wheel boss for Rally/Touring car FIA regulations, or; a quick release for group N, Clubman, or autocross regulations. Additionally, multiple quick releases can be used for the same steering wheel meaning you can use a single wheel for multiple vehicles.

cleanDesc: Genuine BMW M Performance Steering Wheel w/ Display - E82/88 E9X BMW...
short-description: Fully wrapped in premium quality Alcantara. Scratch-proof polycarbonate cover for the OLED display screen and colored LEDs. EfficientDynamics Mode: Real-time fuel efficiency data. Average fuel economy and average speed. Water and oil temperature (water temperature only in diesel cars). Fuel efficient shift points via LED shift lights and EfficientDynamics Index (“EDI”) calculation. Sport Mode: Built-in stopwatch. G-force meter for longitudinal and lateral acceleration. Water and oil temperature and multicolored LED (red and green) shift lights for optimal performance. Race Mode: Stopwatch with storage of values of up to 30 laps (lap time, max speed, max G-force). Measurement of up to nine section times within each lap. 1/4 mile race setting (“XMAS” tree LED light countdown, reaction time, 60’ time, 330’ time, 1,000’ time, 1/8 and 1/4 mile times and trap speeds). Not for M3 vehicles with Dual Clutch Transmissions. If the vehicle has option code S248 the heated steering function will no longer be active after installation. Air bag unit and multifunction buttons can be carried over from sport or M sport steering wheels but cannot be carried over from basic standard steering wheel. Genuine BMW Steering Wheel - Bmw Performance This item fits the following BMW Chassis: E82, E88, E90, E92, E93

cleanDesc:
M-Technic Steering Wheel for E9x & E8x w/ Round Sport Airbag
  ...
short-description: This is a RARE Genuine BMW M-Technic steering wheel, which features perforated leather at the 9 and 3 o'clock positions, smooth leather at the 12 and 6 o'clock positions, and black stitching along the inside edge. This wheel has the same diameter and thickness as the E90/E92/E93 M3, and can be used on all non-paddle shift E90 and E92 which already have the rounded "sport package" airbag. On a non-M3, this wheel makes a huge improvement in both look and feel, giving your non-M the beefy hand grip thickness the M3s come with from the factory.    The attractive European style perforated leather not only looks great/unique, it also feels simply superb in your hands. This M-Tech steering wheel can be used to either upgrade the look and feel on a 2008+ M3, or for upgrading a non-M 3 series or 1 series, as long as your 3 series / 1 series is a 2007 or newer, and already has the compatible round "sport package" style airbag (see photo). You must reuse your existing airbag, and it MUST be the round style which came on the sport package models). Airbag is not included. Not compatible with paddle shift SMG/DCT models.    This item is the steering wheel only, and does not include the airbag or front fascia. You may add a new "M" style front trim panel, as pictured, for an additional charge, or you may reuse your current front fascia. If you opt to add the ///M trim panel, you must reuse the multi-function button panels as the trim panel does not include the button/switch units.      2007+    328i, 328xi, 335i, 335xi **WITH sport package AND WITHOUT paddle shift  2007+    328i & 335i **WITH sport package AND WITHOUT paddle shift  2008+    coupe & convertible with 6 speed manual (no DCT)  2008+    128i & 135i ** WITH sport package airbag

cleanDesc: E9x BMW Performance Rennsport Steering Wheel
short-description: This is the coolest steering wheel we have ever seen from BMW. Hardcore racing drivers and enthusiasts will recognize right away the features of this wheel are intended for maximum control, feel, and function during spirited driving.   This is a factory BMW Performance wheel that we have dubbed the 'Rennsport' wheel. This is the basic wheel behind the famous Performance wheel but without the data display, shift lights, and other doo-dads. It's been reduced to the simplest form by BMW's motorsport-oriented engineers to be a functional element in the driving experience and not only a place to rest your hands.   This wheel is covered in alcantara suede with white stitching. It's the same thickness and shape as the factory M3 wheel. The bottom section of the rim has been flattened to allow more thigh room and a better grip when making turns of the wheel past 90 degrees. Flat bottom wheels can be found on the world's highest-performing cars and it's the first time we have seen BMW offer this style as a factory accessory. A reference mark on the top of the rim indicates top dead center of the steering. This mark is common on rally cars and drift cars to let the driver know when the steering wheel is back straight-ahead, without having to look away from the road.   This wheel replaces the sport or M3 steering wheel. It re-uses the stock sport wheel airbag or M3 airbag (not included) and the stock sport wheel cover or M3 wheel cover (not included, see below for options). Photo above shows this wheel assembled with airbag and cover (not included). It works with manual transmission cars only.   This Genuine BMW 'Rennsport' Performance Steering Wheel fits the following BMWs:  2007+ E90/E91 3 Series Sedan 328i, 328xi, 335i, 335xi **WITH sport package AND WITHOUT paddle shift  2007+ E92/E93 3 Series Coupe/Convertible 328i & 335i **WITH sport package AND WITHOUT paddle shift  2008+ E90/E92/E93 M3 coupe & convertible with 6 speed manual (no DCT)  2008+ E82/E88 1 Series 128i & 135i ** WITH sport package airbag

cleanDesc: F87 M2 BMW M Performance Steering Wheel
short-description: This special wheel is for the committed driving enthusiast! This is a factory BMW steering wheel from the M Performance accessory catalog. It's a direct replacement upgrade over the stock M2 wheel but with some added features that the serious driving enthusiast will appreciate. The most obvious change is the alcantara fabric at the 9 o'clock and 3 o'clock positions. The alcantara fabric is grippier than leather, especially when wearing leather driving gloves. A blue band marks the 12 o'clock position for easy straight-ahead reference. The wheel rim is thicker and has been contoured and sculpted around the human hand for the optimum grip. The overall diameter is the same as a stock wheel but the bottom is slightly flat to allow more leg clearance. Tri-color Motorsport stictching finishes off the details.

cleanDesc: Rennline Steering Wheel Quick Disconnect - Black
short-description: Looking for the highest quality steering wheel quick release on the market? Well this is it. This hub has a tapered asymmetrical socket that eliminates chances of looseness as the hub breaks in, a feature not normally found on competitor's quick disconnects. Also, Rennline Quick Releases are equipped with spring loaded roll pins that allow for seamless one hand removal, which is essential for emergency situations.

cleanDesc: Sabelt SW-635 Steering Wheel
short-description: Sabelt makes some of the finest racing steering wheels for any application. Premium materials and fine craftsmanship combine to offer a wheel that is extremely well built and timelessly beautiful. 6 mounting holes and the ability to be used with a quick release makes these wheels extremely modular in regards to mounting style and gauge/shift light configuration. Choose a welded wheel boss for Rally/Touring car FIA regulations, or; a quick release for group N, Clubman, or autocross regulations. Additionally, multiple quick releases can be used for the same steering wheel meaning you can use a single wheel for multiple vehicles.

cleanDesc: OMP Corsica 350mm Steering Wheel
short-description: Classic 3-spoke OMP steering wheel in 350mm diameter and 95mm dish. Anodized aluminum center with OMP horn button and suede on the rim. The dish offset pushes the steering wheel towards the driver instead of flat against the hub. The steering wheel rim has a round shape instead of exaggerated oval found on other racing wheels. A top-center band gives you a strong reference point for when the wheel is angled or back to center.

cleanDesc: OMP Indy Steering Wheel - 250mm | Black Suede
short-description: Race inspired 3-spoke OMP Indy suede steering wheel in 250mm diameter. Anodized aluminum center with OMP stamp and black Suede rim. The steering wheel rim is oval shaped so your fingers wrap around the rim for improved grip. The spokes form a small T in the center of the steering wheel leading down the to flat bottom design. The 250mm size is much smaller compared to most BMW wheels (stock is usually around 380mm) and may block gauges or instruments, depending on steering column adjustment. A steering column hub adapter is required.

cleanDesc: OMP Racing GP Racing Steering Wheel -- Black Polyurethane
short-description: Sporty 3-spoke OMP Racing GP steering wheel in 330mm diameter. Anodized aluminum center with OMP horn button and black leather-like polyurethane rim. The steering wheel rim is oval shaped so your fingers wrap around the rim for improved grip. The spokes have contours for resting your thumbs to give you more leverage and grip. The grip itself is textured at the 9 and 3 positions for extra control of the steering wheel. The 330mm size is on the small size compared to most BMW wheels (stock is usually around 380mm) and may block gauges or instruments, depending on steering column adjustment. A steering column hub adapter is required.

short-description: URO Parts is one of the leading manufacturers of high quality direct replacement aftermarket components, covering a wide range of makes and models. All of their replacement parts are manufactured to ISO 9000 certification standards, so you can expect long lasting performance from URO Parts. As a leading source of high performance BMW parts and accessories since 1993, we at Turner Motorsport are honored to be the go-to supplier for tens of thousands of enthusiasts the world over. With over two decades of parts, service, and racing experience under our belt, we provide only quality performance and replacement parts.
